articles.author: Zach Lowe
articles.title: Lowe - Why the Milwaukee Bucks need absolute peak Giannis Antetokounmpo to defeat these Boston Celtics - ESPN India
articles.description: The Boston Celtics have been by far the NBA's best team since Jan. 1. The Bucks? Well, they have Giannis. Here's everything you need to know for this titanic Eastern Conference matchup.
articles.content:
The Milwaukee Bucks held most of the cards going into the last day of the regular season.

articles.title: NBA legend Dwight Howard thanks PM Modi for transforming Varanasi; 'Found peace' - Hindustan Times
articles.description: NBA legend Dwight Howard, who recently visited Varanasi in Uttar Pradesh heaped praise on PM Narendra Modi for transforming India. Sharing his experience on Instagram, the Basketball star said that his India trip has rejuvenated his soul and humbled him. In t…
